phrases: She says she loves our cakes.
Please teach her everything you know, Ichinose-kun.
You are worried about her, huh?
I guess being worried is pointless.
That is a sudden epiphany there
I will just have to be ready, in case anything happens to Yamato.
I am glad you encouraged me to apply, Takeo-kun.
I think their cakes are the best in the world!
I have no idea how they are made.
Someday, I want to see them all being made.
Help Wanted Patissier Patissier Assistant Sales Staff (High school student and temp positions available) Ask staff for details.
Why do not you give it a try?
Okay, but if I do, I might not be able to spend as much time with you.
It is finally spring break, too.
Do not you want to try something you have always wanted to do?
So this cake is from Les Cerises.
It kind of looks like it was constructed.
You know, like it is made of plastic...
I have no idea where to start eating it
I think he is saying it is like a work of art.
So, like Yamato said, this is a professional's work.
Why cannot I say something more insightful, damn it?
It is rich, but not too heavy.
The way they use liquor is innovative, too.
There is a company called Mandarin.
There was a competition for cakes using their liquor!
Sorry, I am talking way too much...
You are such a good listener,
so I just get going, you know?
I guess I really like that about you.
they said I was relaxed today.
It made me wonder what would have happened if I had not been.
After you get used to your job, I will come visit.
Okay, I will give it my best.
When I visit, I will buy a bunch of cakes.
I am looking forward to it, Yamato!
You can ask me anything, if you are not sure.
You could say I am the owner's right-hand man.
but you are so good, I could not help but stare!
Do you want to become a patissier?
It looks fancy, but you need a lot of elbow grease.
Just wanting it is not enough.
Well, I suppose I was in competitions and stuff.
Hey, so I was watching you work today.
Oh, and you are too slow at packing cakes in boxes.
We would not want our store's reputation to suffer.
The owner told me to teach you stuff, so that is why...
I wonder if Yamato's gotten used to things.
I am sure it is better than on her first day.
I am going to keep trying.
I will get much faster at packing cakes!
I really like being near cakes,
I have not had you come buy any yet, either.
By then, I will have the job down!
Well, considering how she went after you...
Do not let what Ichinose-san said get to you.
Ichinose-san does not really listen to others.
He is kind of in his own world, I guess.
He certainly has skills, and he is handsome, but...
Anyway, do not take anything he says to heart.
I will be going on ahead.
It is like a dream come true!
I wonder what it tastes like.
An idea a pro would think up!
Thank you for letting me have one.
When will we start selling these?
Because it is a cake I came up with.
The owner said it is okay.
Once, I sold a cake of mine.
I cannot stand seeing any of my cakes unsold!
Then, how about I buy any that are left?
I can buy up to three!
Then I will eat them with my bthose I care about!
Why would you do that for me?
Well, I mean the cake's so wonderful.
I would hate it not to be shared with the world.
Then maybe I will have them put three for sale.
I will do my best to sell them tomorrow!
I will do my best to sell them!
I am looking forward to tomorrow, then.
I am looking forward to tomorrow.
I am looking forward to tomorrow.
I am looking forward to seeing you, Ichinose-san.
I am looking forward to seeing you, Ichinose-san.
I wonder what it tastes like.
Oh, I highly recommend that cake.
Okay, I will get this one.
has feelings for me, after all.
No, I meant your first name.
Takeo, you are even more conspicuous that way.
I would not want Yamato to see me.
Come on, it is break time.
It is only spring, but from the tan, you look like a Reverse game piece.
That hurt more than I expected.
Why not use her first name, too?
Would not it make you nervous?!
I think Yamato-san would be happy if you used her first name.
It just is not for me, okay?
It is not easy for me.
What is hard for me is not so hard for others.
You can have any you like.
Oh, it is nice and cold!
It is so cold and tasty!
Yeah, one of the patissiers threw a gelato party.
Oh, it was him, over there.
What happened between then and now?
Takeo-kun, I brought you the best-tasting one.
Maybe I should not have told her to get a part-time job.
and I cannot make them for sure.
My hands are cold from holding them for so long.
I really wanted you to have some!
Because I am not confident in myself as a man,
I cannot be totally happy for her.
Who would have thought Ichinose-san would suggest anything like that?
I am starting to think he might be nice, after all.
That was the first time we saw him smile, right?
carry the small man I am, out to open sea?
I kind of get what you mean,
but I do not really get it.
I do not feel this way because of anyone else...
It is because of my inability to use her first name.
And I am getting hurt because I cannot even overcome that little obstacle.
I am such a small man.
It is normal to not feel too good about
I guess you are just a guy, after all.
I never really thought about how
Yamato might fall for someone other than me.
There might be someone she gets along with more.
I just never thought about that possibility
because she was always with me, smiling.
Why do you have to feel so down?
She is only known that guy for about a week.
People do not fall for each other right away.
That is why I thought everyone would fall for her, too!
Maybe your goal for now should be to use her first name.
Message Inbox Yamato Rinko Subject: On Break Right Now
I got used to my work,
so you can come to buy cakes anytime!
Yesterday's gelato was a huge hit...
What motivated you to do that?
I thought about how to make the person eating it happy.
You have good skills and taste,
but you have been kind of a lone wolf until now, you know?
But lately, you have become friendly with everyone!
If you rank, it would be great for our store.
And it would be good for your career, too.
You have been on a roll lately.
How many are you going to buy?
Were those people just now your friends?
The taller one is my boyfriend.
I am a better fit for her!
I am sorry to come at you like that, out of nowhere.
Are you trying to become a patissier, too?
I am a better fit for Rinko for sure
I am a better fit for Rinko for sure!
Why are you two even dating?
Well, Yamato was getting harassed by a groper, so I helped her
After you helped Rinko out of a tough spot,
she must have seen you as a wonderful, responsible guy.
She just does not know there are other men who are a better fit for her!
I am a patissier at Les Cerises.
I am Gouda Takeo, a first-year in high school.
You must have someone who would be good for you.
Someone who is more wild, like a gorilla...
Do not you think you would have better conversations
if you dated a woman like that?
Maybe even share the same hobbies?
so please break up with her!
Of course you would say that.
You would not be convinced by what I said.
But if Rinko asked you, you would break up with her, would not you?
I will show you and Rinko who is the better fit for her.
I will not let you have her!
You could have talked back to him more.
Well, I could not help but think he might have a point.
It is true that I cannot really talk to her about that sort of thing.
And that there may be others who would be better.
Oh, that is perfect for her,
I am not a huge fan of sweets, but I will have some.
I was surprised how even Takeo has issues with feeling inferior...
You are way too close, Sis.
I do not know if that means he has an inferiority complex,
but that is a bit worrying...
Sometimes, Takeo can put himself on the back burner.
Remember when he found a lost dog?
He became so fond of it...
And he stayed with it for a long time.
But the moment he realized the dog might belong to someone,
This dog has a collar, so it belonged to someone.
he started frantically looking for its owner.
When he finally found the owner,
Takeo held it together and did not cry.
He said he was happy for the dog.
The weather forecast was totally off.
It was sunny till just a moment ago.
Dad did not take an umbrella with him!
No one took an umbrella today.
I will wait till the rain dies down.
I will give you a ride.
Oh, my sister just said she will bring me an umbrella.
I will wait at the store.
I have a favor to ask you, Rinko.
I am going to enter a competition.
I need to think up at least three original cake recipes.
With your help, I think I can win!
Takeo sometimes puts other people's feelings before his own,
because he just wants the other person to be happy...
